author: Eric Levitz
title: Fed Projection: Coronavirus Crisis Could Drive Unemployment to 32 Percent
description: The pandemic could force 47 million Americans out of work, according to new projections from the St. Louis Federal Reserve.
content: Ever since the novel coronavirus escaped containment in China earlier this year, Wall Streets economic projections have been plagued by misplaced optimism. In the first week of February, the investment management company Invesco projected that by summer the U… [+3312 chars]
